name: Access Control
description: Limit system access to authorized users, processes, and devices, and to authorized activities and transactions.

name: Asset Management
description: Manage assets throughout their lifecycle to maintain their cybersecurity risk posture.

name: Audit and Accountability
description: Audit activities to provide accountability and monitor compliance.

name: Configuration Management
description: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories of organizational systems.

name: Identification and Authentication
description: Verify the identities of users, processes, or devices prior to allowing access.

name: Incident Response
description: Establish operational capabilities for incident response.

name: Media Protection
description: Protect system media containing sensitive data.

name: Personnel Security
description: Ensure personnel security through screening, training, and addressing risk.

name: Physical Protection
description: Limit physical access to systems, equipment, and operating environments.

name: Risk Assessment
description: Assess risk to organizational operations and assets.

name: Security Assessment
description: Regularly assess and monitor security controls.

name: System and Communications Protection
description: Protect information during transmission and monitor communications.

name: System and Information Integrity
description: Ensure system and information integrity through monitoring and timely updates.

name: Recovery
description: Ensure recovery of systems and information.

name: Risk Management
description: Manage organizational risk due to operation of systems.

name: Situational Awareness
description: Implement threat monitoring to support risk management decisions.
